mapper.update: UPDATE comment SET content = #{content}, reg_date = now() WHERE comment_id = #{commentId}
mapper.select: SELECT comment_id, article_id, writer, user.nickname as writerNickname, content, `left`, `right`, date_format(reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as reg_date FROM comment LEFT JOIN user ON comment.writer = user.id WHERE article_id = #{articleId} ORDER BY `comment_id` ASC
